Agrypnos:Trowel.NAME: Trowel
Agrypnos:Trowel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger the growth of a random Flower in your hand.
Agrypnos:Trowel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger the growth of a Flower in your hand.

Agrypnos:Bramble.NAME: Bramble
Agrypnos:Bramble.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Thorn to your hand.
Agrypnos:Bramble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Upgraded Thorn to your hand.

Agrypnos:Rose.NAME: Rose
Agrypnos:Rose.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Thorn to your hand for every 10 damage dealt. NL At the end of your turn, increase the damage by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Pesticide.NAME: Pesticide
Agrypnos:Pesticide.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL Draw 1 card.

Agrypnos:FuneralWreath.NAME: Funeral Wreath
Agrypnos:FuneralWreath.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Flower in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies once for each Flower in your hand. NL Exhaust all Flowers in your hand.
Agrypnos:FuneralWreath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [E] for each Flower in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies once for each Flower in your hand. NL Discard all Flowers in your hand.

Agrypnos:Weeding.NAME: Weeding
Agrypnos:Weeding.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Weak, hit again for double the damage.

Agrypnos:Blossom.NAME: Blossom
Agrypnos:Blossom.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the growth of a Flower X times and play it. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:Blossom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger the growth of a Flower X + !M! times and play it. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:ViolentBloom.NAME: Violent Bloom
Agrypnos:ViolentBloom.DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a Flower. Deal !D! damage for each time it had grown.

Agrypnos:NaturePurity.NAME: Nature's Purity
Agrypnos:NaturePurity.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards other than Flower cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] for each card Exhausted.

Agrypnos:Restock.NAME: Restock
Agrypnos:Restock.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have no Flowers in your hand. NL Draw !M! random Flowers from your draw pile.

Agrypnos:Rake.NAME: Rake
Agrypnos:Rake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Add !M! Seed to your hand.
Agrypnos:Rake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Add !M! Upgraded Seed to your hand.

Agrypnos:RustyShear.NAME: Rusty Shear
Agrypnos:RustyShear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! Affliction for each hit that deals unblocked damage.

Agrypnos:EntanglingVines.NAME: Tangling Vines
Agrypnos:EntanglingVines.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:BigShovel.NAME: Big Shovel
Agrypnos:BigShovel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Seeds to your hand.
Agrypnos:BigShovel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Upgraded Seeds to your hand.

Agrypnos:Till.NAME: Till
Agrypnos:Till.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL If the target has Block, apply !M! Vulnerable and draw a card.

Agrypnos:Replanting.NAME: Replanting
Agrypnos:Replanting.DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a Flower in your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:Replanting.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Flower in your hand. It costs 0 until played. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Rainfall.NAME: Rainfall
Agrypnos:Rainfall.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the growth of all Flowers in your hand, draw pile, and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:CombTheEarth.NAME: Comb The Earth
Agrypnos:CombTheEarth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Upgraded Seed to your hand.

Agrypnos:SeedPacket.NAME: Seed Packet
Agrypnos:SeedPacket.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Seeds to your hand. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:SeedPacket.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Upgraded Seeds to your hand. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:MortarAndPestle.NAME: Mortar And Pestle
Agrypnos:MortarAndPestle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Flower in your hand. Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Hoe.NAME: Hoe
Agrypnos:Hoe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, gain 1 Fertilizer.

Agrypnos:Shell.NAME: Shell
Agrypnos:Shell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Flower in your hand.

Agrypnos:StormShelter.NAME: Storm Shelter
Agrypnos:StormShelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. For !M! turn, Flowers cannot grow.

Agrypnos:Preserve.NAME: Preserve
Agrypnos:Preserve.DESCRIPTION: Flowers will not grow for !M! turn. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block and [E] are not reset at the start of your next turn.

Agrypnos:Sunbeam.NAME: Sunbeam
Agrypnos:Sunbeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Trigger the growth of a random Flower in your hand !M! times. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:Sunbeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] . NL Trigger the growth of a Flower in your hand !M! times. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Tumbleweed.NAME: Tumbleweed
Agrypnos:Tumbleweed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Prune.NAME: Prune
Agrypnos:Prune.DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a random Flower in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards.
Agrypnos:Prune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reset the growth of a Flower in your hand. NL Draw !M! cards.

Agrypnos:GeneModification.NAME: Gene Modification
Agrypnos:GeneModification.DESCRIPTION: Increase the amount by which a Flower in your hand grow by !M! permanently. NL Fleeting.

Agrypnos:FloralScent.NAME: Floral Scent
Agrypnos:FloralScent.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to yourself and ALL enemies.
Agrypnos:FloralScent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak to yourself and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

Agrypnos:Watering.NAME: Watering
Agrypnos:Watering.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the growth of all Flowers in your hand.

Agrypnos:Verdancy.NAME: Verdancy
Agrypnos:Verdancy.DESCRIPTION: Double the current growth of each Flower in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:SpringArrival.NAME: Spring's Arrival
Agrypnos:SpringArrival.DESCRIPTION: Add X Seeds to your hand, draw pile, and discard pile. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:SpringArrival.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X Upgraded Seeds to your hand, draw pile, and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:NaturalNutrition.NAME: Natural Nutrition
Agrypnos:NaturalNutrition.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Trigger growth of all Flowers in your hand.
Agrypnos:NaturalNutrition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Trigger growth of all Flowers in your hand twice.

Agrypnos:Rot.NAME: Rot
Agrypnos:Rot.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust a random card in your hand.
Agrypnos:Rot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

Agrypnos:Thorn.NAME: Thorn
Agrypnos:Thorn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Seed.NAME: Seed
Agrypnos:Seed.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL Upon being Exhausted, grants !B! Block and grows into a random Flower.
Agrypnos:Seed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal NL Upon being Exhausted, grants !B! Block and grows into a random Upgraded Flower.

Agrypnos:Wolfsbane.NAME: Wolfsbane
Agrypnos:Wolfsbane.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Poison applied by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Nightshade.NAME: Nightshade
Agrypnos:Nightshade.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply 7 Poison. NL Apply !M! Affliction. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Affliction applied by !growth!. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:Nightshade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply 10 Poison. NL Apply !M! Affliction. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Affliction applied by !growth!. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Azalea.NAME: Azalea
Agrypnos:Azalea.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your turn, increase the damage by !growth!.

Agrypnos:CorpseFlower.NAME: Corpse Flower
Agrypnos:CorpseFlower.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies. NL When a card is Exhausted, increase the Poison applied by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Carnation.NAME: Carnation
Agrypnos:Carnation.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !B! Block. NL When this card is Exhausted, gain twice as much and move this card to your discard pile. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Block by !growth!.

Agrypnos:MorningGlory.NAME: Morning Glory
Agrypnos:MorningGlory.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your turn, reduce damage dealt by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Poinsettia.NAME: Poinsettia
Agrypnos:Poinsettia.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards. Gain !B! Block for each Exhausted card. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Block per card by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Kudzu.NAME: Kudzu
Agrypnos:Kudzu.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your turn, Exhaust !M! random cards in your hand prioritizing Flowers and increase the damage by !growth! for each Exhausted card.

Agrypnos:Hyacinth.NAME: Hyacinth
Agrypnos:Hyacinth.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage. Your next attack this turn has an additional !M! Strength. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Strength by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Dandelion.NAME: Dandelion
Agrypnos:Dandelion.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your turn, increase Block gain by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Narcissus.NAME: Narcissus
Agrypnos:Narcissus.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Choose a card. Exhaust !M! random other cards. NL Add !M! identical copies of the chosen card to your hand. NL At the end of your turn, increase the number by !growth!. NL Exhaust.
Agrypnos:Narcissus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Choose a card. Exhaust !M! random other cards. NL Add !M! identical copies of the chosen card to your hand. NL At the end of your turn, increase the number by !growth!.

Agrypnos:QueenOfTheNight.NAME: Queen of the Night
Agrypnos:QueenOfTheNight.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Unplayable. NL Upon taking damage, reduce it by !M! and discard this card. NL At the end of your turn, increase the reduction by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Zinnia.NAME: Zinnia
Agrypnos:Zinnia.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !M! Dexterity until the end of this turn. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Dexterity gain by !growth!. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Rue.NAME: Rue
Agrypnos:Rue.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Remove !M! random debuff(s). NL Any unused removal grants 1 Artifact instead. NL At the end of your turn, increase removal by !growth!. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Poppy.NAME: Poppy
Agrypnos:Poppy.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !M! temporary health. NL At the end of your turn, increase the temporary health gain by !growth!. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Cattail.NAME: Cattail
Agrypnos:Cattail.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !B! Block. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Weak applied by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Lotus.NAME: Lotus
Agrypnos:Lotus.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Draw !M! cards. NL At the end of your turn, increase the draw by !growth!. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Wolffia.NAME: Wolffia
Agrypnos:Wolffia.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Apply !M! random debuffs. NL Whenever you play a card, increase the number of debuffs by !growth!. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Camellia.NAME: Camellia
Agrypnos:Camellia.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal damage multiple times, starting with !D! and inflicting 1 less damage each time until reaching 0. NL At the end of your turn, increase the damage by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Snapdragon.NAME: Snapdragon
Agrypnos:Snapdragon.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL At the end of your turn, increase the damage by !growth!.
Agrypnos:Snapdragon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X + !M! times. NL At the end of your turn, increase the damage by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Orchid.NAME: Orchid
Agrypnos:Orchid.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Enemy loses X + !M! Strength this turn. NL At the end of your turn, increase the Strength loss by !growth!. NL Exhaust.

Agrypnos:Sunflower.NAME: Sunflower
Agrypnos:Sunflower.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Gain !M! [E]. NL At the end of your turn, increase the energy gain by !growth!.

Agrypnos:Myosotis.NAME: Myosotis
Agrypnos:Myosotis.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL When this card is played, increase the damage by !growth! permanently. NL Does not reset when played.

Agrypnos:GhostLily.NAME: Ghost Lily
Agrypnos:GhostLily.DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Ethereal. NL Upon being Exhausted, Exhaust all Flowers in your hand and add !M! Seed(s) to your hand for each Exhausted card.
Agrypnos:GhostLily.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flower. NL Ethereal. NL Upon being Exhausted, Exhaust all Flowers in your hand and add !M! Upgraded Seed(s) to your hand for each Exhausted card.

Agrypnos:RoseGarden.NAME: Rose Garden
Agrypnos:RoseGarden.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you are attacked, deal 4 damage back and add a Thorn to your hand.

Agrypnos:Fertilize.NAME: Fertilize
Agrypnos:Fertilize.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the growth of !M! random Flower in your hand at the start of each turn.

Agrypnos:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
Agrypnos:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Upon playing a Flower, gain !M! Block.

Agrypnos:Winter.NAME: Winter
Agrypnos:Winter.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Flowers no longer grow. NL All Flowers are played twice.
Agrypnos:Winter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Flowers no longer grow. NL All Flowers are played twice.

Agrypnos:Summer.NAME: Summer
Agrypnos:Summer.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Increase the amount by which all Flowers grow by !M!.
Agrypnos:Summer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the amount by which all Flowers grow by !M!.

Agrypnos:Pollen.NAME: Pollen
Agrypnos:Pollen.DESCRIPTION: When a Flower grows, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy.

Agrypnos:Composting.NAME: Composting
Agrypnos:Composting.DESCRIPTION: Each time you Exhaust 4 cards, gain !M! Fertilizer.

Agrypnos:MorningSun.NAME: Morning Sun
Agrypnos:MorningSun.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Flowers that have not grown cost !M! less [E].

Agrypnos:SunZenith.NAME: Sun's Zenith
Agrypnos:SunZenith.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, the Flower in your hand that has grown the most times has its cost reduced by !M! until the end of the turn.
